website_summaries.verdict: An environmentally friendly paint choice that offers excellent coverage.
pros: Eco-friendly paint can be used on interior or exterior walls
Goes on smooth with exceptional coverage
Available in a range of colors
Low odor makes the paint easy to work with
High quality especially for recycled paint
cons: Some complaints of the paint cans arriving damaged

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical of buying paint on Amazon, especially at this low price point. I'm sure glad I made the purchase. What an incred
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of buying paint on Amazon, especially at this low price point. I'm sure glad I made the purchase. What an incredible value for a great paint! I was a professional painter for over 15 years and am quite a critic. Given the coverage of this paint, I'd expect to pay well over $25/gallon. I did a side-by-side comparison with 4 alternative paints that were all much more expensive and none of them covered like Montage. Two coat application was necessary for each paint I tested (as expected) but the uniform finish was best with Montage. I'll certainly be using this paint again for my next project!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice paint but the snow white color did not look like the sample shown on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Paint looks nice but it is not representative of the color shown on Amazon's website. The color is a pure white and not a vanilla/ off white. I used a 5 gallon container but it doesn't look good on my wall. I would like to replace the other 5 gallon containers but I can not find any contact info. Update! I contacted the company and they were very receptive to my issue with the color. They offered me a complete refund and I would buy their paint again. Excellent service and product
customer_reviews.author: David Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Incredible coverage over dark colors
customer_reviews.text: Incredible coverage over dark colors! I’ve been using the Snow White on gray, lime green, orange and finally navy blue. Attached picture shows 1 coat (lower side) and 2 coats (upper side) over the extremely heavy blue. Needless to say I’ve ordered more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality  paint
customer_reviews.text: This is some very good paint. I love the color , Navajo White, semi gloss, which is a pale cream /faded lemon. . It goes on well, hardly needs a second coat. Cleans up easily, Dries quickly. Does have that stinky paint smell. Here is a picture of the Montage over my old nasty porch white. It’s a great paint especially for the price. The lid was held in place by four metal clips. No spill.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far but finish is more like a semi-gloss.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this all over the place indoors and out on all types of projects! I’ve already used 1/2 the bucket and think it’s a great value. So far 2 coats has been efficient for the coverage I’ve needed. My only complaint would be I wasn’t sure what “low Sheen” meant and I was looking for matte and this is not matte. Perhaps low or semi-gloss would be better fitting.
customer_reviews.author: DIY365 Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with this paint!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two, 5 gallon buckets of this paint and I painted a 4'x4'x4' Mail box, a 12'x16' shed, and a 16'x10' deck, (not pictured), inside and out, and still have Paint left. It is fast drying, and I'm really happy with it... I thought for sure I would need more then 5 gallons.. I was very surprised.. Don't know what I'm gonna do with the other 5 gallons.. Maybe make all the trees in my yard all redwood trees!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Super nice neutral cool brown. The consistency is nice and awesome quality. Local amazon packagers did a great job at packaging. Everything is bubble wrapped so there was no spill. Depending on the colors of your kitchen or whatever room you’re planning to paint and the lighting, the final color may differ. Bc of my brown marble kitchen counter tops and the lighting in my kitchen, the paint can look gray on dark gloomy days even though it’s a nice neutral cool brown. Didn’t bother me but just be aware of this when choosing the paint color! I only used half the container which is 1 gallon to do 2 coats to my kitchen cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Chue yang

customer_reviews.title: Highly endorse this brand!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny and more! This paint looks gorgeous in our nursery. Going to purchase more. Delivered to my doorstep. It has a low odor, even drips on our dark carpet came out with a warm rag and laundry detergent. Color was highly accurate in the Amazon screen. I highly recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LCW4WINE

customer_reviews.title: Covers well
customer_reviews.text: Used this paint to cover some awful green wallpaper with white dots. (House was built in 1986.) It covered very well! Also, I accidentally dripped some on the floor, didn't notice till after 30 minutes of painting, but quickly scrubbed it away in a few minutes. It dried quickly, looks amazing, and doesn't rub off with a damp cloth. It really makes the bedroom look so much better. Highly recommend and will remember to purchase this again if I need it. I love this color.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Old Paint - Save Your Money.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed with purchasing this product. I loved this color and was so excited to receive it. When you stir the paint bubbles form. The paint is old paint and shouldn’t have been sold period. We tried using the paint and of course it was horrible. Honestly we ended up buying new paint at Lowe’s. It was a long drive going three counties away. We should have did that in the beginning in order to get a quality paint for our newly remodeled bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Hilson

customer_reviews.title: I took the chance and wasn’t disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I’m amazed at how well the color matched my expectations. I wanted greige color and this (dove gray) was it, since the trim in our house it stained. The coverage was good, I did do 2 coats as I feel it’s more durable. The paint isn’t too shiny and I prefer that. Also it dried so quickly and I appreciate that. The paint was shipped with a stir stick, paint can opener and directions. Best of all, this paint fits my budget!
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Dented cans but great product!
customer_reviews.text: I got a note in my box saying not to give a negative review for damaged product because that’s the shippers fault yet the boxes were completely intact and not damaged and my paint can was securely wrapped in bubble wrap yet it was very dented inside of that so it must’ve been dented prior to shipping. Not gonna give them a negative review though because I love the actual paint and the dented cans don’t change that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Queen

customer_reviews.title: Not a one coat type paint
customer_reviews.text: 4/18/2019; I got my paint today, a day late but it's here none the less. I painted one test wall and I can say I do like but not love this paint, it's goes on without a lot of splattering and I love the color (old walnut) but it has an odd smell, will need at least two coats for complete coverage and I wish the 5gal pale had a pour spout. Given the fact it's eco friendly and rather inexpensive I gladly except the differences between this and high end brand name paints. Over all I am satisfied with my purchase and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Parks

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite paint!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this paint! I ordered 15 gallons of the shade, Snow White and it is beautiful on the walls, very bright and fresh. This paint is nice and thick and is exactly what you need. If you were contemplating buying this paint, I’m telling you right now to go ahead and buy it!!! Great quality, Great price!!! I will definitely buy this paint again!
customer_reviews.author: Miabella

customer_reviews.title: Not true to color. Had to change my whole room design & color
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 3 stars because the color is pretty, yes! But the color I got was Twilight.. even tho the paint read Twilight it’s as if they sent me a bluish color. It doesn’t look gray AT ALL! At first it look like it wasn’t even painted it looked like it was cream in the light but when it dried it was blue & it literally comes off with water. I mopped my floors & the paint from the bottom of my wall came cleannnnnn off. Thank God I still had paint stored away I had to repaint it other than that I kinda got used to the color & I kinda like it now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not quite white?
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage. Two coats to fully cover a similarly covered wall. The color is--- not quite white? I can't tell what shade it is but our ceiling is white and it doesn't quite match it. Seems like good quality paint though.
customer_reviews.author: KathrynOfficial

customer_reviews.title: very fair company to deal with
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the first 5 gal it was perfect. I ordered the second 5gal same color I ordered the first time however, as you can see in the pic the second bucket is darker. Not happy about that, had already started painting before I noticed it. Had it been the same color as the first I wold have been 110% happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Mays

customer_reviews.title: I do like this paint
customer_reviews.text: I do like this paint. It is easy to use and clean up. It is lasting through sun and rain. The only drawback is that I did not get the primer/paint and it does take 2 and, depending on the color I am covering, 3 coats. I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P Moore

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this paint. It was shipped in great shape and arrived in a timely manner, even during this pandemic. Great price point and I love that it is eco friendly recycled paint. Now for the paint itself - fantastic coverage, dries fairly quickly and didn't have an overpowering smell (though we did paint outside). The color is really pretty and even and has nice cool blue undertones. We used this outside on cinderblock walls that had some faded creative murals on them and it covered them easily in one coat, no primer! We did do a second lighter coat because of the porous surface. Five gallons completed our entire wall and our patio. Paint is holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua B Daffron

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with this paint, especially for the price and convenience of getting it right to my front door. Covers well. I did have to do a couple coats, but I think it's just because I have textured walls. If I decide to paint anything else, I'll check out their other colors. **This is the twilight gray. It's DEFINITELY a blue-gray. Depending on the light, it's basically light blue. I like the color it is in warm light better because it's more gray, but that's just my opinion.**
customer_reviews.author: Jeni

customer_reviews.title: My go to paint now.
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant at first because of the price but so worth it! I used this paint with a paint sprayer and was painting a hot pink room to white. It took only two coats with the sprayer and looked perfect. Will definitely buy this paint again. Also the smell was very different. To me it almost smelled like milk. Not harsh at all.
customer_reviews.author: Krisi

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love
customer_reviews.text: This paint is so awesome. It’s pretty thick and goes on even. I could definitely get away with one coat. The smell is really not bad. I got the dove gray. It’s darker than I thought it would be but I like it. It’s like a restoration hardware gray. Very neutral and no weird undertones. Get this paint!
customer_reviews.author: Krispar28

customer_reviews.title: One of the easiest paints I've applied. Low odor. Great coverage.
customer_reviews.text: So I really like how this paint went on, easy to apply, low odor, great coverage. I ordered 3 different colors. Blue bayou went on gray and turned a beautiful blue. The Slate gray I never received and was refunded. Now the Sage, looked beautiful online when applied it looked like a grayish green. I was hoping it would change and nope it stayed the same. I don't completely hate it but I was really hoping it'd be a little bit darker.
customer_reviews.author: V Sanada

customer_reviews.title: Yellows immediately
customer_reviews.text: This paint in their other color brick red is AMAZING even tho it came damaged and open IT was absolutely wonderful paint, this however is terrible and with in a few hours of drying became yellow and cracked I tried it on other surfaces thinking maybe it was a fluke but NOPE this paint has something wrong with it maybe it’s just my bucket but omg it’s so bad and I will have to sand down and re paint what I painted with this
customer_reviews.author: Carmela

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This paint is awesome. Was a little hesitant buying at first being that i hadn’t heard of this company before. I went off my neighbor’s recommendation and I’m sure glad i did! Now I’m looking around my house for more projects. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: A. A

customer_reviews.title: Great price for awesome coverage
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the paint was perfect for my paint sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Carmencita

customer_reviews.title: Great quality paint!
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure how buying paint online and having it delivered would turn out be it was truly amazing. It came packed well, the can had no defects. The paint itself was thick and went on evenly and I only needed 2 coats to completely cover the previous color! I got the Dove Gray and the shade was exactly what I was looking for. Very satisfied!! I plan on getting another can in a different shade for my next project :)
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: Great paint. Clean, satiny smooth with good coverage. I was painting over tears of nicotine stains, and it covered perfectly with two coats
customer_reviews.author: Toni Tails

customer_reviews.title: Super beautiful but it has a strong scent
customer_reviews.text: I really love the color. So easy to apply even for the first time painter like me. It dries so fast and one-coat was enough to make a dramatic change in my living room. It has a pretty strong scent, but it went away. I wish there are more color options. I wanted to purchase more if there are darker color options.
customer_reviews.author: Gn

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’m not an experienced painter and I think this paint was very user friendly I didn’t prime my surface (dark brown wood) and this paint has pretty good coverage I could have only did 2 coats but I decided to go in with a 3rd I love the way it turned out. The smell wasn’t strong at all. I painted an entire dresser inside of my apartment.. I had company 2 hrs after and they said they wouldn’t even have known that I’d painted because there was no smell
customer_reviews.author: Mariah holguin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent painting, you do not need a second application with the first one is perfect. The performance specified by the actual manufacturer and exceeds it. My experience with this painting was satisfactory, for which I recommend it for its good price and very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t judge before it dries!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even know you could buy paint on Amazon but here we are. This color is gorgeous AFTER it dries. I’m so glad I gave it a chance because when you first look at it in the can, it’s like a beige-y non-color. Now it’s my favorite color in the house and it really does look just like the picture. We painted two rooms with one gallon and then ordered a different color (which was also great). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coats really well
customer_reviews.text: This has more of a smell than I'd prefer for using indoors, but it coats very well and is an excellent paint. I'll be using it for outdoor projects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN HOME DEPOT / LOWES BRANDS
customer_reviews.text: I was REALLY impressed by this eco-friendly, recycled paint. Not only is the price lower than what you would find at Home Depot or Lowes, but it also covers better than more expensive paints I bought from there in the past. Incredible coverage, beautiful color and overall, a really great paint. I am super impressed - you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KyRich

customer_reviews.title: ordered dove gray and got an ugly dark beige
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to use this ecofriendly paint. However not only does it not even closely match the shade shown, it is not even near any gray. I have no place to use this paint so I just waited money. Of course when I had time to use it and discovered it was completely wrong, it was outside the time I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: No Coverage
customer_reviews.text: Used in my bathroom and it did not cover well. I put 4 coats on my walls and I should put another coat on but I was so tired of painting. I even used a clear primer so it should have covered better. You wouldn't think almost a full gallon was used, I should have at least a 1/2 left but sure didn't. I have never had to do so much work before.
customer_reviews.author: lmwt90

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in great shape
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today and it was very well packaged which was nice! I haven’t painted yet but I love that they are doing their part to help save our planet. Will update more when I start painting
customer_reviews.author: alisha

customer_reviews.title: Good paint but is darker than swatches.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy to use. This paint is a normal consistency and covers nearly everything with one coat. Two coats is saturated enough to cover anything. Con: This color is a lot darker than the swatch on the can or the pictures on Amazon. It dried probably 2 shades darker than the pictures lead you to believe. It is more camouflage/army green.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah M

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for an amazing, low price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Twilight color for my kitchen. The paint was easy to work with, went on nicely, and definitely covered well. I was painting on white primer, so I could have probably gotten away with a single coat of paint. I ended up doing a second coat and it looks beautiful. The matte finish really hides the imperfections in the wall. The smell was not bad at all. Typical new paint smell that dissipated after a couple hours. I wish this company had more colors because I am sold on this paint!
customer_reviews.author: racehorse6

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it is to clean before it dries out completely. It covers very well, you might need two or three coats if you’re painting on bright colors like I was (one wall was lemon yellow, the other hot pink). It smells good as well. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Giada Geraci

customer_reviews.title: They made it right.
customer_reviews.text: I just got the package. And I don't normally put bad reviews but I read someone said they got the damaged one. But I didn't care much of bad reviews so decided to order. Well That whoever wrote a bad review had is what exactly happening to me. As soon as I opened the box and plastic, paints all over the places. ***They sent me sorry note with browny and sent me replacement right away. this time the seal wasn't broken.
customer_reviews.author: magard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect paint
customer_reviews.text: I was a little leery because of some of the reviews regarding the smell and the color being off but when it arrived it was the perfect color (Dove Gray). I started the next day and began to paint my living room which is 30 x 15 and a dark mocha color and it only took one coat, it was beautiful I then painted my bathroom, and two hallways and still have at least 3 gallons or more left. I'm so glad I purchased the paint and I would defiently purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Rosy P.

customer_reviews.title: The only brand to use
customer_reviews.text: I’m a huge fan now. The price can’t be beat, it’s eco-friendly, and goes on smooth and dries beautifully. Doing one room Twilight which worked out nicely, then the next two will be blue bayou and Swiss coffee. If they had a few more colors I could do the whole house! One gallon each seemed to get us through an average bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wrong color
customer_reviews.text: The color swatch shown is NOT NOT NOT the color. The color is red on the site, red mark on top and red square on side. This paint is NOT red, it is milk chocolate brown. I bought a 5 gallon bucket and now what?
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Easy paint to use
customer_reviews.text: I used the paint on my entire hair salon with two cans I got two full coats on the walls(perfect) the color dries fast and leaves no streaks. So if you don’t know how to paint it’s fine you won’t see any mess ups. I can’t stress how beautiful the paint is Ig@houseofkeratin_
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: prepare for multiple coats if covering any color
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is what I would consider average. we had a very light tan to cover and it took 3 coats and still isnt perfect. a good paint could have done this in 2 tops.
customer_reviews.author: BigCrab

customer_reviews.title: Much lighter than picture.
customer_reviews.text: Not near the darkness! 2-3 shades lighter than picture. Good paint though. Just lighter than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mythic

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color! Also its recycled ! but great
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful cool grey! It makes my room look so refreshing during the summer! Highly recommend! It is not a depressing grey but like a happy grey! The quality of the paint is awesome! It dries quickly and goes on the wall beautifuly! Just wait till it dries for the Final effect!
customer_reviews.author: zuleika sanchez

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best and the easiest I worked with. No weird after shades. Doesn’t look purple pink or blue. Gorgeous gray! Wouldn’t change it for a anything else. Best decision I ever made! Perfection. Purchased it in Dove Gray
customer_reviews.author: ITL

customer_reviews.title: Patina Review
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the color Patina: Overall, I think it is a good product. However, the picture portray it as more of a creamy beige color, when painted on it applies as more of a grayish color with a slight underlying purple tint. It paints on more like pewter if you look at the swatch pictures. Overall, it’s pretty but it just wasn’t the color I wanted and didn’t match our color scheme. Would definitely try the product again, I would just be weary of the color not matching what’s in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Best paint I have used
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! This is now my number 1 go to for paint. It covers well, one coat is definitely enough. Covers dark colors just as well as white. Does have a little splatter which it's paint most do. The price seems to be a little high for me. We bought dove grey and it's beautifuly soothing.
customer_reviews.author: shell lee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality of paint
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this paint to finish some woodworking projects from our shop. The finish dries perfectly, and took fewer coats than I normally need for unfinished wood. The paint did not drip or streak, and I would order it again for future projects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good paint for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I painted half the wall Twilight, which is actually a very nice elephant gray. Matched our dark gray perfectly. I put an acrylic overcoat on it and then this train track graphic. This bathroom is in a train restoration shop and gets dirty easily. The paint was less expensive, holds up well, great color and looks fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: K. Failes

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended pair peels of can't even wipe it cause it comes out of the wall☹️
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PAINT FOR THE PRICE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised that this paint was as good as it was for such a low price. I used two coats of it in my livingroom. Very little fumes and it dries fast. It does come out more of a light blue grey as opposed to the grey it shows. I will more than likely be buying more of this brand for some of my other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Mykids0503

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute wonderful. Coverage was great, not bad smelling, easy to work with. I highly suggest the Patina color, it's a beautiful light greige, totally transformed my guest bath. Loved the color so much I'm buying more to do my main livingroom/dining area.
customer_reviews.author: JixKnits

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: Okay I don't have any before and afters but this stuff is AMAZING! Covered navy to light gray in 2 coats. It goes on smooth and very even. Can't attest to durability as we painted our house to sell it, but the ease of application was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Car

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: We painted all the area around the pool. Looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: christy menke

customer_reviews.title: Almost Dusk = Love
customer_reviews.text: Kind of in love with the Almost Dusk color. I agree with a lot of reviews that said the coverage is very good and two coats is what you need. I don't care if the paint can is dinged as long as the paint is of good quality! It's also a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This paint is crap
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money, the paint streaks, and it takes 2-3 coats to get a solid coverage. I ended up getting rid of it and bought Behr. I purchased Swiss Coffee and it looked almost white. It was a waste of money for labor and materials.
customer_reviews.author: Tomi

customer_reviews.title: Just ok...
customer_reviews.text: This is inexpensive paint which is good on one hand. On the other - it takes several coasts to paint an already-light colored room. Even with primer. Also, color is not consistent. Semi gloss is significantly whiter than low-sheen. I used the semi gloss on base molding and it looks funny.
customer_reviews.author: J.K.P

customer_reviews.title: Great paint!
customer_reviews.text: Was kinda iffy on this paint. I never hesrd of the brand and it was $60 cheaper than the 5 gallons at Lowes. But I LOVE it. It looks great I did one light coat see how it looks and its nice. We did a second coat and its perfect! Never used before and I'm glad I gave it a try! Took a week to get but its 50 LBS so I understand.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Exploded paint
customer_reviews.text: My paint is a great color however the box want marked fragile so it exploded. Hopefully the next can comes in a usable condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10 stars
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this paint, one color was perfect. It was very easy, and I did it myself. You do not need a professional with this ink. I'm very grateful for that. My color was twilight and I did not mix water.
customer_reviews.author: Aline Olmos

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: This paint is okay. The only thing i'm not happy about is the odor. We painted over 2 weeks ago and the smell is still pretty strong. Hopefully this subsides. Other than that, covers well, goes on smoothly and evenly.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much, I bought another 5 gallon.
customer_reviews.text: INTERNET!! I loved it so much I bought another! I painted the F out of a bare wooden shed; yep, and the ceiling too. Now it looks clean AF. It took all 5 gallons via a spray gun for the whole shed.
customer_reviews.author: Christenstock

customer_reviews.title: Foul smell!
customer_reviews.text: The color is beautiful but holy hell this stuff SMELLS! Like not chemicals...but maybe mildew? I got halfway through and decided to scrap it and get a new can of ain’t. Extreme disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KRuss

customer_reviews.title: Colors are not true to swatch
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great - goes on easily and cleans up well. My issue is that the color was not true to the swatch available online. What arrived was significantly lighter than what was shown - like 3-4 tones lighter. We are going ahead with using it, but we will probably end up repainting soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Finish!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the Montage paint that I purchased for my bedroom! Applied like a dream and really only would have needed one coat, but I went ahead and did two anyways. I highly recommend this paint!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for your money , great job thank you
customer_reviews.text: Nice paint used for my patio turned out great , very smooth good paint , went on easy , dried very quickly, great job will buy again thank you
customer_reviews.author: Tx customer

customer_reviews.title: Will buy and use again
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product. The coverage is amazing. We painted the whole kitchen with two coats with 1 gallon. The only drawback was the initial smell. It was like rotten eggs but went away once paint dried.
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: Buy with extreme caution
customer_reviews.text: Is this a joke? I ordered this online bc i had gift cards and the reviews seemed ok. No..... this is watercolor paint. I tried it on regular wood before applying to my walls and it doesn’t even add a slight coat. Not only that, but it’s not the off white the site claims. It’s plain white. I will never order this again. And btw you can’t return it so it’s a wasted 5 gallons of paint which is pointless considering they’re trying to help the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C.

customer_reviews.title: True to color but needed multiple coats
customer_reviews.text: true to color, fast shipping. It is the white portion (lower half) of my hallway and looks great! However Paint was a little thin so I had to use multiple coats.
customer_reviews.author: britt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I chose this paint because it was relatively inexpensive. Much to my surprise it turned out to be a superior product. I bought 2 more gallons to use on a larger more exposed area.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Best paint I have ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best paint I have ever purchased!! I was able to paint an entire bedroom, my kitchen/dining one coat coverage, and there is still paint left! Amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the gray!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! I purchased the gray color. My walls were like a off white with a hint of peach. Gray painted over it with ease, no need to use primer!!! So happy with this color. I was very nervous ordering paint without seeing it in person, but this is perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.author: E Shell

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Great color! Used in my bedroom. My walls were a very dark purple before and I only had to do one coat! Very pleased with the way it came out!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Petrassi

customer_reviews.title: Three coats to cover a pale green?
customer_reviews.text: Three coats to cover a pale green? This paint is other crap. I’ve never painted with anything this bad since I was in college 40 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Readhead13

customer_reviews.title: Color Inaccuracies
customer_reviews.text: I bought this paint after enjoying the color at a friends house. Not being one to cheap out on paint, I was hesitant to order online but after seeing the color in person I was convinced. The color I received looked nothing like the color in my friends house. Hers was an ever slightly warm tone gray, and what I received looked like a peachy pink color. It was also one of the worse smelling paints I have used. I guess I have learned my lesson on ordering paint online.
customer_reviews.author: Ali B.

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely be buying more!
customer_reviews.text: First let me start by saying that the package was delayed by 2 days but that was probably because I ordered 2 5 gallons of paint, so it wasn't really an issue. The paint does have a unique smell to it but this paint covers EVERYTHING. We recently started painting our new home and the walls were pretty bad from the previous owners, and to my amazement one coat was enough to cover any problems and a second made it perfect. I highly recommend this paint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great paint at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant buying this based on mixed reviews and I am more than happy that I bought it. It covered well, and was thick enough not to easily run. It was the exact color advertised. It cleaned up well from the brushes and me....I am not a neat painter! Assuming holds up well, I would eagerly recommend it or repurchase it. It is also made in the USA, which is also great. I’m a very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing packaging
customer_reviews.text: Came wrapped in thick bubble wrap, packing peanuts and hard metal strips that are easy to remove on the can. No mess at all. Very impressed. Color is bm just what I was looking for :)
customer_reviews.author: sandi baratta

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This paint worked perfectly for what we needed! We did need two coats as the previous color was still showing through after the first coat, but one gallon was sufficient for our 110 sq.ft. room, we have a good amount left over that will be great for touch ups as needed. Definitely recommend. Color: Dove Grey
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dries to fast and does not leave a good finish for interior trim painting.
customer_reviews.text: Dries much to fast and when dry it leaves a bad finish on interior trim and door no matter if sprayed, rolled or brushed. The colored paints worked better but not snow white.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I needed to refinish a metal shed. After cleaning the exterior with bleach I started to paint. I can honestly state that Montage Signature paint covered the metal flawlessly. I did apply a second coat but about 70% of the surface did not actually need it. I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Tom M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light grey color. One coat covered the old blue, but it still needed a second coat to look perfect. Really love the color!
customer_reviews.author: C Breid

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this paint is horrendous, I couldn’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: saulosgirl

customer_reviews.title: Pay the Extra Money
customer_reviews.text: I was so looking forward to working with this paint; however, upon opening it and stirring and stirring......I go to apply it on the wall....only to find out that it provides very poor coverage.. I applied one coat, stepped back, took one look, and decided I made a mistake buying a cheaper grade paint. It will now cost me more since I will have to buy from either Lowes or Home Depot. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Bavaro

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE PAINT
customer_reviews.text: THE SHIPPING WAS GREAT , WRAPPED SUPER GOOD. THE PAINT IS VERY PRETTY IN COLOR, HAVE NOT USED IT YET BUT I THINK IT IS JUST WHAT I NEEDED
customer_reviews.author: M. southard

customer_reviews.title: A Great Paint for my Project
customer_reviews.text: Lovely paint that transformed my kitchen. Easy to use. Great coverage and low scent. A great environmentally sound product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color!
customer_reviews.text: Would have given five stars if it would have been the correct color. The paint cleaned up easily, was easy to use, and was a great value, but the color was terracotta and I ordered brick red.
customer_reviews.author: RyantheFett

customer_reviews.title: love love love love love
customer_reviews.text: I painted an accent wall in my apartment this dusty rose color and it's just beautiful. I have a purple couch against the wall with a forest green knitted throw and some gold pillows and it all just blends so beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Again good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Used on my front door when I bought it still they’re not shipping the fading looks wonderful very nice color
customer_reviews.author: Rev.Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great when you actually get it.
customer_reviews.text: The first time I ordered this paint it was amazing! I loved it so much that when I was ready to start on the room I came right back. But it has been 3 weeks since i ordered it and i still have not received my paint. I'm really disappointed this time.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Color matched on second try. Can damaged as well.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like that I received the wrong color to begin with or that I had to pay to return the wrong one. The second one I received was the correct color but the can was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jerald

customer_reviews.title: Best paint
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this paint but I’m glad I did. Here different pictures for some areas and looks better than the other paint. It does look gray not blue like the one I did before. And that’s what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: IMENE

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Second time buying, love the color but unfortunately this time around it arrived busted. Paint was everywhere, all in the bubble wrap. But I saved what I could.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica N

customer_reviews.title: Sustainable paint!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used this paint yet bc it is darker than I thought and I’m painting a small room. I love the fact that it is sustainable and made from recycled paint! Even if I return it, I will buy this brand again, but in a different color!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this paint if you are doing a large job. The quality just is not there. It took several coats to even make it look presentable...not good...just presentable. Definitely will go with another brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Color was almost white. It was extremely thin and took twice as much paint to cover needed areas.
customer_reviews.author: David

product_meta.title: Montage Signature Interior/Exterior Eco-Friendly Paint, Swiss Coffee - Semi-Gloss, 5 Gallon
product_meta.description:
Color:Swiss Coffee| Size Name:5 Gallon| Style:Semi-Gloss

Look No Further!

If you’ve been looking for quality, Nature friendly paint from companies such as Home Depot, Lowes, or Walmart, look no further!

With 24 classic shades, and many more limited edition colors, Montage Signature Paint is the go-to, USA made, nature friendly option for updating the color of your home, office, garage, or furniture!

Dozens of Color & Finish Combinations

Choose from one (or many) of our 24+ color options available in 2 deluxe finishes: Low-Sheen and Semi-Gloss.

Whether you're looking for a subtle shade of beige or a brighter pop of green, our curated color palette has beautiful options to transform your space - indoor or outdoor!

Nature Friendly Water-Based Paint

Montage Paint is formulated as a quality, water-based, Nature friendly paint, ensuring a better experience for your next paint job.

Easy to Apply

Our paint applies smoothly and has superior hide and coverage making a new paint job simple!

Superior Protection

Montage Paint is easily scrubbable and defends against mold and mildew for easy cleaning!

Marks from everyday wear can easily be wiped clean without affecting the stunning color and perfect finish! 

CLICK ADD TO CART now to experience the Nature Friendly Montage Paint difference and save the planet!
feature_bullets: ✅EXTREMELY VERSATILE - Montage Signature is the #1 choice for all of your professional painting needs - interior/exterior, small residential spaces, large commercial buildings & everything in between!
✅SUPERIOR COVERAGE & PROTECTION - All of our specialty finishes let you brush smoothly & evenly while delivering maximum coverage. Improved sealing technology defends against moisture, mold & mildew
✅ECO FRIENDLY - We're committed to the highest quality environmentally-friendly & pollutant-free materials, and a rigorous engineering and testing process for each of our leading professional paints
✅10 YEAR WARRANTY - We can't wait to add you to our long list of loyal customers turning to Montage Signature for all of their painting needs. All paints are covered by our 10 Year Premium Warranty
✅MADE IN USA - Montage Signature Paint believes in the power of a thriving American economy and the integrity of its people. 100% produced from Raw & Post Consumer latex paints right here in the USA

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars774 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
